sentences.english: They would keep Saab’s Trollhättan plant in production, but would also aim to build Saab cars in China.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他們希望可以在中國生產薩博汽車。

sentences.english: Whether Saab will survive in the long term is less clear.
sentences.chinese: 薩博能否長治久安尚不明朗。

sentences.english: Similar to Sabonis in his ability to spot up for threes at well over 7 feet.
sentences.chinese: 類似於薩博尼斯擁有的能夠在7尺外投擲3分的能力。

sentences.english: So who is most likely to win the heart of Saab?
sentences.chinese: 那麼誰最有可能贏得薩博的芳心呢？

sentences.english: That's right, Bernie is part of the Genii Capital bid for Saab.
sentences.chinese: 是的，伯尼是海格薩博的資本參與競投。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, GM said Spyker sealed a deal for Saab.
sentences.chinese: 週二通用汽車表示，世爵已完成收購薩博的交易。

sentences.english: We're not interested in Saab or the other brands out there.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有收購薩博還有其他的國際品牌的意向。

sentences.english: Saab is also likely to offer a dual-clutch gearbox in the 93.
sentences.chinese: 薩博很可能會爲93車型提供雙離合變速器。

sentences.english: It can sell 200-300, 000 cars a year there by 2016.
sentences.chinese: 到2016年，薩博每年可以在中國賣二三十萬輛。
